casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 4, 2009

[Cite as 12/04/2009 Case Announcements #2, 2009-Ohio-6349.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-2183. State ex rel. Polaris Innkeepers, L.L.C. v. Westerville.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon review of the complaint and the motion for expedited consideration,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that respondent shall file responses to both the complaint and the motion for expedited consideration no later than December 10, 2009.
